name: Run|Jump|Climb
description:
Can you help our brave hero surpass all the dangers and loot the treasures of the dungeons. Welcome to Run|Jump|Climb where our hero has to literally run, jump and climb through the level to claim the treasures.

Just a disclaimer, I'm strictly a programmer so the art work is just something I found on the internet. If anyone would like to make art assets for this game I'd love to hear from you!

Enjoy the game! 

P.S. I'd love to know what times you guys are able to finish the levels in, post them in the comments.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.

Z to jump.

Hold X to grab on to grass areas to climb them.
